Detailed Description

Class for calibration of potentiometers in Puma560.

This class provides methods for calibration of potentiometer intercept (encoder reading at zero pot) and potentiometer slope (relation between pot reading and encoder reading) values for the robot. The class also provides a method to determine the position of first encoder index pulse from initial position of manipulator.

Member Function Documentation

void startCalibration ( )
 

This function starts the calibration procedure.

bool isCalibrationOver ( )
 

true if calibration process is over.

void estimateJointPositionFromEncoders ( )
 

Allows encoder registers to be set to estimated values of joint positions from reading the pot values.

bool isEncodersEstimated ( )
 

Returns:
true if encoders have been estimated in the control cycle.

void correctEncoders ( )
 

Correct the encoder register to the right encoder values This function must be the last statement called in the program.

int control ( ) [virtual]
 

Reimplementation of the Qmotor function with added functionality.
